articles.title: Britain's Got Talent judges Amanda Holden and Alesha Dixon appear to have a tense conversation - Daily Mail
articles.description: Britain's Got Talent judges Amanda Holden and Alesha Dixon appeared  tense before the live semi final on Thursday at the Apollo London.
articles.content:
Britain's Got Talent judges Amanda Holden and Alesha Dixon appeared tense before the live semi-final on Thursday at the Apollo London.
Alesha, 43, seemed to be having a serious conversation with Ama… [+5005 chars]
